name: Figaro
description:
Purple Sky Studios is pleased to announce Figaro.  A  2.5D side scroller puzzle game where you must save Figaro the puppy from its abusive owners, your neighbours.

Under the light of the purple night you Alice must quest to rescue Figaro. Outsmarting the rats lurking in the shadows, solving puzzles and defeating the sugar hyped up boss. With candy as your secret weapon you must find ways to use it to your advantage. 

Features include: 
Pastel aesthetic, puzzles, purple skies and portentous music

Controls:
WASD - to move 
[SPACE] - to jump
E - to store

WATCH OUR TRAILER 

Release date:
6/12/20       

Platform :
PC

Free to Download
